channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit

item.title: CVE-2023-25512|2024-08-02T11:25:18.408Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20cuda%20toolkit
item.description: NVIDIA CUDA toolkit for Linux and Windows contains a vulnerability in cuobjdump, where an attacker may cause an out-of-bounds memory read by running cuobjdump on a malformed input file. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to limited denial of service, code execution, and limited information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2023-25513|2024-08-02T11:25:18.467Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20cuda%20toolkit
item.description: NVIDIA CUDA toolkit for Linux and Windows contains a vulnerability in cuobjdump, where an attacker may cause an out-of-bounds read by tricking a user into running cuobjdump on a malformed input file. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to limited denial of service, code execution, and limited information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2023-25514|2024-08-02T11:25:18.505Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20cuda%20toolkit
item.description: NVIDIA CUDA toolkit for Linux and Windows contains a vulnerability in cuobjdump, where an attacker may cause an out-of-bounds read by tricking a user into running cuobjdump on a malformed input file. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to limited denial of service, code execution, and limited information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2023-25510|2024-08-02T11:25:18.608Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20cuda%20toolkit
item.description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit SDK for Linux and Windows contains a NULL pointer dereference in cuobjdump, where a local user running the tool against a malformed binary may cause a limited denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2023-25511|2024-08-02T11:25:18.366Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20cuda%20toolkit
item.description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit for Linux and Windows contains a vulnerability in cuobjdump, where a division-by-zero error may enable a user to cause a crash, which may lead to a limited denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2023-0196|2024-08-02T05:02:43.919Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20cuda%20toolkit
item.description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit SDK contains a bug in cuobjdump, where a local user running the tool against an ill-formed binary may cause a null- pointer dereference, which may result in a limited denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2023-0193|2024-08-02T05:02:44.145Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20cuda%20toolkit
item.description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit SDK contains a vulnerability in cuobjdump, where a local user running the tool against a malicious binary may cause an out-of-bounds read, which may result in a limited denial of service and limited information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2024-0072|2024-08-01T17:41:15.878Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20cuda%20toolkit
item.description: NVIDIA CUDA toolkit for all platforms contains a vulnerability in cuobjdump and nvdisasm where an attacker may cause a crash by tricking a user into reading a malformed ELF file. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a partial denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-0076|2024-08-01T17:41:15.939Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20cuda%20toolkit
item.description: NVIDIA CUDA toolkit for all platforms contains a vulnerability in cuobjdump and nvdisasm where an attacker may cause a crash by tricking a user into reading a malformed ELF file. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a partial denial of service.
